xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 509
THE STING
Patric M. Verrone Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: A By-Product Of The TV Industry.
Planet Express: Hangar. Bender and Fry prepare for a game of Virtual Golf. Bender is all kitted out in golf gear. He takes his club from Fry and puts the ball on the tee.
xml.speak: A hush comes over the crowd. The only sound is Bender calling everyone else a jerk and he swings! And he slices it into the water, oh man!
xml.info: He plugs himself into the game and appears on the screen. He jumps into the lake. Enter Hermes and Farnsworth.
xml.speak: Bad news everyone. You're not good enough to go on your next mission.
Hooray!
Not good enough!
xml.info: They high-five. Leela descends from above in a harness.
xml.speak: Why? Says who?
Because. And says me. It's an extremely dangerous mission that killed my last crew. And you're not nearly as good as them.
Woohoo!
We live to suck another day!
xml.info: They both do a happy dance. Leela disconnects Bender from the game.
xml.speak: We're just as good as any of those crews you sent to their deaths. What's the mission?
Collecting honey. Ordinary honey.
That doesn't sound so dangerous.
This is no ordinary honey. It's produced by vicious space bees. A single sting of their hideous neuro-toxin can cause instant death!
And that's if you're not allergic! You don't wanna know what happens then, oh no no, God no!
Your insides will boil out of your eye sockets like a science fair volcano!
I didn't want to know1
xml.info: He bursts into tears.
xml.speak: These bees are larger than most Buicks and twice as ugly!
Larger than an American sedan? How big is the honey comb?
Honey comb's big. Yeah yeah yeah.
It's not small?
No no no.
It'll take more than deadly deadly bees to keep us from doing our job. Come on boys!
But Leela we're no good!
Listen, I'm scared too. But I'm more scared of disappointing myself.
I'm not scared of that at all!
xml.info: She pushes him towards the ship.
Ship's Cockpit. The ship flies towards the space beehive and lands just inside. Swarms of bees fly past with their space pollen. Leela paints yellow and black stripes on Bender.
xml.speak: Now bees communicate by dancing.
Like my parents. Oh wait, that was hitting!
So this language cartridge will let you distract them.
xml.info: She installs the cartridge into the slot in the back of Bender's head.
xml.speak: Ah good! I always have thoughts and feelings that can only be expressed through dance! (in bee) You stink! Bender's great! Deal with it!
xml.info: He laughs.
Beehive. Leela and Fry are wearing the red spacesuits and they make their way into the hive carrying a long hose. A bee flies in front of them and they gasp.
xml.speak: Bender quick! Waggle something!
xml.info: As Bender talks Fry and Leela make their escape.
xml.speak: (IN BEE) Hello fellow bees. How's the abdomen? Swollen with nectar I trust?
(IN BEE) Duh!
xml.info: Time Lapse. The crew get closer to the centre of the hive.
xml.speak: Leela let's turn back. There's absolutely no shame in wussing out.
Relax, everything'll be fine!
xml.info: They look up and see a ship caked in honey. It has a familiar logo on the tail.
xml.speak: Oh my God! The old Planet Express ship!
There's the black box!
xml.info: She picks it up and plays it.
xml.speak: ON TAPE Captain, the bees have us surrounded! Oh the Professor was right, we're not as good as his old crew!
ON TAPE Well I aim to prove him wrong! It'll take more than a few deadly deadly bees to - Oh Lord!
xml.info: He screams some more and Leela switches the tape off.
xml.speak: Uh, couldn't make that out. Too much static!
xml.info: Fry and Bender aren't so sure.
Time Lapse. The crew crawl into part of the honey comb. It drips with honey.
xml.speak: Ew!
xml.info: They arrive at the end of the tunnel and gasp.
xml.speak: We found it! The honey comb hideout!
xml.info: Time Lapse. Leela puts the hose into a river of honey and the hose sucks it up. Fry looks at something else.
xml.speak: Hey what's this goop?
Royal jelly. They feed it to the queen.
Bees make honey and jelly? Huh. How come nothing humans make taste good? Help! I can't swim in jelly as far as I know!
xml.info: Leela pulls him out.
xml.speak: Look! It's a baby queen! Aww she's so cute! You adorable wittle itty bitty fuzzy wuzzy -
Leela! Stop bonding and lets go! I got jelly in my underpants!
I'm taking this bee with us. With queen we can build a hive and make more honey ourselves. Let me just pack her a lunch and we'll go.
xml.info: She dips a jar into the jelly.
xml.speak: (IN BEE) Pick up the pace lady! I'm sick of shaking my booty for these fat jerks! I didn't mean you're all fat. Just fatso there.
xml.info: He points at a fat bee.
xml.speak: (IN BEE) He insulted our fat queen!
(IN BEE) You try keeping your figure after 10,000 kids!
xml.info: The bees dive at the crew. They duck. Bender runs away. The queen tries to sting him. Bender grabs a hold of her sting. She shakes him around.
xml.speak: This is where we distinguish ourselves from the last crew. Activate emergency high speed self contained escape pack crisis response unit! Quick!
xml.info:
She flies off with a jet pack. Fry turns his on but he is wearing it the wrong way and flies off upside down. The bees chase him and Leela. Fry hits the sides of the honey comb on the way through the tunnels and Bender hangs onto the queen's sting screaming. Leela dodges a bee and it hits the comb and explodes.
[Cut to: Outside Ship. Leela and Fry fly towards it.
xml.speak: Good luck Bender!
xml.info: They fly through the cargo bay hatch.
Cut to: Ship's Cargo Bay. Leela closes the hatch.
Cut to: Outside Ship. The ship tries to take off but the honey holds it down. The queen prepares her sting.
Cut to: Ship's Cargo Bay. Her sting comes through with Bender on the end.
xml.speak: I'm back baby!
xml.info: Cut to: Outside Ship. The cargo bay hatch closes, the queen falls from the ship and they take off. The bees sting the ship and dent it. The ship speeds away from the hive, blowing the bees back.
Ship's Cockpit. Fry cheers and Leela puts the baby queen in a little pet basket.
xml.speak: We made it! We're alive!
Burn on that old crew! The only things they did better than us were suck and die!
Leela we got lucky this time but you should be more careful. I don't want anything to happen to you.
Thanks, but I can look out for myself. Frankly I can smell danger a mile away.
xml.info: The bee unfolds it's sting.
xml.speak: Look out! You want her you'll have to go through me.
xml.info: The bee goes through Fry and he and Leela fall to the floor. The bee writhes around on the floor, dying. Bender quickly throws it into the airlock and jettisons it. It floats away into space and a space truck hits it. Leela looks where the sting hit her.
xml.speak: You call that a wound? That's a boo boo top! But thanks for trying to save me Fry! Fry? He's...he's dead.
xml.info: She and Bender kneel beside him.
xml.speak: (CRYING) Who will make Bender waffles just the way he likes them now?
xml.info: Orbitting Meadows National Cemetery. Fry's funeral has begun. He is in an open casket. Mourners that include Leo and Inez Wong and two Trisolians pay their respects to him. Leela cries.
xml.speak: (CRYING) It was all my fault! He died because of me!
No no no no no no no. I'm lying to make her feel better.
xml.info: Leela cries more.
Time Lapse. Hermes and LaBarbara pay their respects to Fry. Hermes puts piece of burning paper on the coffin.
xml.speak: Husband, can't you go anywhere without lighting something up?
It's an old Jamaican accounting tradition. We burn his timecard. That way his zombie doesn't come back looking for his final paycheque.
xml.info: They leave and Amy and Zoidberg stand beside Fry.
xml.speak: He looks so natural. It's funny to think he's clammed full of sawdust and preservatives.
I only wish I could have removed the stinger.
xml.info: They look at Fry's body, the huge sting sticks out of him.
Time Lapse. Father Changstein el Gamahl of the First Amalgamated Church begins the eulogy.
xml.speak: I barely knew Philip, but as a clergyman I have no problem telling his most intimate friends all about him.
xml.info: The congregation cries.
xml.speak: Soothe us with sweet lies.

It may comfort you to know that Fry's death took only 15 seconds. Yet the pain was so intense that it felt to him like 15 years. And it goes without saying that it caused him to empty his bowels. We now commend Fry's body to the ages.
xml.info: The coffin turns around and is ejected into space. Scruffy plays Walking On Sunshine on the bagpipes.
xml.speak: He's walking on sunshine now.
This makes me the oldest member of my family.
xml.info: He cries and hugs Bender.
xml.speak: Him do good snu-snu.
xml.info: Behind her the radiator from the Miss Universe pageant, Petunia, the girl from The Hip Joint, Morgan Proctor and Michelle aren't so sure.
xml.speak: All those times I said "Kill all humans" I'd always whisper "except one." And Fry was that one. And I never told him so.
xml.info: He cries and hugs Farnsworth. Terry does his swooshy coat thing.
xml.speak: (DRAMATICALLY) Farewell from the world of tomorrow!
xml.info: Leela's Bedroom. She tickles Nibbler and wipes her eye with half a hanky. She puts the other half on her bedside table and sees the jar of honey.
xml.speak: (CRYING) They say a spoonful of space honey helps ease the pain. It's good. I feel funny. Haha funny!
xml.info: She laughs and then faints.
Leela's Dream. Leela floats towards Fry's coffin and it opens.
xml.speak: Leela?
Fry? I thought you were dead.
Nope, I'm better than ever. Before the accident I couldn't do this!
xml.info: He sticks his hand through the sting wound.
xml.speak: Impressive! But it does sorta support my You-Are-Dead theory.
Then I'll prove I'm alive! By telling you something only I could know. There's a surprise for you in my locker. I got it at a Swedish novelty shop before we left.
xml.info: Behind him his locker appears. He opens the door and pulls out a gift-wrapped box and hands it to Leela. She gasps.
xml.speak: It's too beautiful to open! Can I open it?
Sure. There's just one thing I want you to.
What?
I want you to wake up.
Wake up? But I'm not -
xml.info: Cut to: Leela's Bedroom. She wakes up. It's the middle of the night. Nibbler rolls of the bed.
Planet Express: Locker Area. The crew sans Bender are gathered around Fry's locker.
xml.speak: In my dream Fry said he hid a gift for me in my locker. If it's true then he must still exist in some form.
Oh course he still exists. As a frozen corpse in outer space! Oh, I made myself sad.
Well, here goes.
xml.info: She opens the locker. It is empty. The crew sigh.
xml.speak: Bupkiss!
xml.info: Enter Bender counting some cash and whistling.
xml.speak: Well, I feel better now. Pawning all the stuff in Fry's locker helped give me closure.
Was there anything in there that might have been a gift for me?
No. Nothing. Not at all. No way Josï¿½! Here it is.
You took this from Fry's locker?
Hey the guy's dead! There's no law against grave robbing!
xml.info: Leela opens the gift. It's a squeezy toy.
xml.speak: That proves it. Fry is alive somewhere and he's reaching me in my dreams.
Bullpies!
xml.info: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. He helps Leela onto a table.
xml.speak: Lay down here and we'll do some tests. If Fry is out there then Leela's brain could be acting as a five pound ouija board.
xml.info: Leela lies back on the table.
xml.speak: Is this some sort of brain scanner?
Some sort yes. In France it's called a "guillotine."
xml.info: He pulls a lever. Leela gasps and jumps out of the way, narrowly missing the blade.
xml.speak: Professor! Can't you examine my brain without removing it?
Yes. Easily.
xml.info: He scans her brain with a small scanner thing.
xml.speak: Hey, what if Fry wasn't actually dead when we buried him? Y'know like Julia Roberts?
Well I suppose there's a slim - I don't believe it!
What is it? Is Fry alive in some other dimension or something?
No. According to this gizmometer, Fry is dead and nothing can bring him back! Remarkable.
But, my dream. Your science can't unprove that! How could I have know the gift was in Fry's locker?
Easy! He told you about it before he died! And your grief roasted mind blocked it out.
Are you saying I'm going crazy?
No no, no one's saying that! But I'm certainly thinking it loudly.
xml.info: Leela's Bedroom. She tosses and turns in her sleep.
Cut to: Leela's Dream. Back in space Fry appears to her like the Cheshire Cat, just his hair and mouth.
xml.speak: Hi Leela! I'm just gonna keep talking, even if you can't hear me. Blah blah blah, blah blah blah blah blah.
Shut up, I can hear you. The Professor says you're just a dream.
xml.info: Fry appears fully.
xml.speak: Oh yeah? Could a dream take you dancing in an illusion garden?
Well yes, technically. It's still very sweet of you.
Then what if we shared a sleigh ride across the ice fields of Hiperia?
xml.info: The dream changes to an icy landscape. Fry and Leela are pulled along in a sleigh by a woolly mammoth. Fry hands Leela a mug and tears open a packet of cocoa.
xml.speak: Oh Fry you must be alive! I've never been treated so romantically by my own imagination before!
Here, take my jacket. You look a little cold.
Thank you. It's all so beautiful I forgot how many hundreds of degrees zero it must be. I just wish I could convince the others you're alive.
You can. All you have to do is wake up.
No no! Don't say that! This is real!
xml.info: Cut to: Leela's Bedroom. She wakes up and sends Nibbler flying off the bed.
xml.speak: Not another dream! Fry's jacket! The one he was buried in! My dream was real! He's alive!
xml.info: Her neighbour thumps the wall.
Planet Express: Meeting Room. Bender is on fire. Hermes, Amy, Zoidberg and Farnsworth blast him with fire extinguishers.
xml.speak: That's better!
xml.info: He lights a cigar. Enter Leela with Fry's jacket in a jacket jacket.
xml.speak: Fry's alive! I have proof!
You do not!
I'm from Jamaica, the show-me island. So show me you're blowing it out your fanny.
But he gave me his jacket. Look.
xml.info: She opens the jacket jacket and pulls out...her own green jacket.
xml.speak: That's not Fry's jacket. Fry's jacket is red! That's your jacket. An off the rack lime green affair.
But Fry...his jacket...and when I woke up it was on me.
You're under a lot of guilt stress Leela. Here, work it off.
xml.info: He hands the squeezy stress toy and she squeezes it.
xml.speak: SQUEEZING I am not under stress dammit!
xml.info: The toy explodes.
xml.speak: What?
I said everything's going to be alright.
Oh. Maybe I am freaking out a little.
A little? You're screwier than my Aunt Rita! And she's a screw!
I need to calm down. I'd better take some more of that space honey.
You've been taking space honey? Be careful you purple haired imbecile!
One spoonful calms you down, two spoonfuls help you sleep, but three spoonfuls, you'll go into a sleep and never wake up! Never!
(AMY'S VOICE) Never!
xml.info: Leela gasps.
Planet Express: Lounge. Leela takes a spoonful of honey.
xml.speak: One spoonful to calm me down. OK, I've got a pretty good calm going! Two spoonfuls to help me sleep. Uh oh, still awake. I guess one more spoonful couldn't hurt. Oh my gosh! I'd better get a sponge! Fry? Is that you? I don't need a sponge!
Why and I sticky and naked? Did I miss something fun?
xml.info: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. Farnsworth scans Fry with the gizmometer.
xml.speak: Incredible! According to the gizmometer, Fry touched the royal jelly in the space hive, leaving an imprint of his DNA and brainwaves. Then, when it spilled on the couch, it recombined with trace amounts of Fry's hair and skin -
And blood! Don't forget about Fry's blood!
Yes Bender, thank you. In short, the various fluids Fry left in the couch caused the royal jelly to regenerate his entire being!
Neat!
This is great! My buddy's alive and his credit cards are valid again! Lets go get hammered!
xml.info: The crew cheer.
xml.speak: I should warn you: I'm a mean drunk.
xml.info: They leave, leaving Fry and Leela alone.
xml.speak: Fry, I'm so glad I didn't kill you.
Me too.
Feeling responsible for your death was driving me mad. But now everything is alright.
Uh, not everything.
What? What do you mean?
You have to wake up.
Wake up? Oh no! No! It can't be!
xml.info: Cut to: Planet Express: Lounge. Leela wakes up on the couch. The royal jelly wasn't spilt and Fry didn't come back to life. The two spoonfuls did help her sleep. She gasps and looks around.
xml.speak: Poo.
xml.info: Planet Express: Meeting Room.
xml.speak: I'm cracking up. In my dreams I'm happy because Fry is alive, but when I'm awake my mind plays tricks on me.
Oh take it easy Leela.
In every life we have some trouble.
But when you worry you make it double.
(SINGING) The landlord says your rent is late...
(SINGING) He might have to litigate.
(SINGING) But don't worry!
xml.info: He opens his chest cabinet and a bee flies out and stings Farnsworth's head.
xml.speak: (SINGING) Bee...
(SINGING) ...happy!
xml.info: His head explodes and the meeting room goes dark.
xml.speak:
(SINGING) Ain't got no cash,
Ain't got no style,
Ladies vomit when I smile,
But does Zoidberg worry?
xml.info: The bee stings him.
xml.speak: (SINGING) Bee...
(SINGING) ...happy!
xml.info: He explodes. Hermes holds Amy and skates around as the bee flies alongside.
xml.speak: (SINGING) Don't worry now Amy!
xml.info: The bee stings him and he explodes.
xml.speak: (SINGING) OK! I'm happy!
xml.info: The bee stings her and she explodes.
Streamers and glitter falls around the table and Bender dances on it.
xml.speak: (SINGING) Take us home Bender! Don't worry!
(SINGING) Bee...
xml.info: It stings him.
xml.speak: (SINGING) ...happy!
xml.info: He explodes in a rather nice display of fireworks. The smoke clears and everyone is back at the table again.
xml.speak: Uh, were you just singing?
No I was telling you not to worry. I'm not allowed to sing - court order.
xml.info: Ship's Cockpit. Leela takes off in the ship. She is nervous and jittery.
xml.speak: I'll find Fry's coffin, take his corpse and keep it under my mattress to remind me he's really dead. That'll prove I'm not insane.
xml.info: Outside Ship. Leela stands at the airlock in her spacesuit and looks out at Fry's coffin, floating like the monolith from 2001: A Space Odyssey. She jumps out and floats to it. She puts her hands on it.
xml.speak: OK, it's just an ordinary coffin. Containing my ordinary dead friend, who I killed.
xml.info: She opens the coffin. Inside are lots of colours going by very fast like in 2001: A Space Odyssey. Leela stares.
Cut to: Leela's Bedroom. She wakes up from what was another dream.
xml.speak: What happened? Why am I in my apartment?
xml.info: Farnsworth's, Zoidberg's, Hermes' and Amy's faces appear on her walls.
xml.speak: Stop it! Stop it!
xml.info: She tears their faces down like wallpaper. Bender appears on the floor.
xml.speak: You killed Fry!
xml.info: She grabs the hoover and sucks him up.
xml.speak: OK, I'm insane! But I'm still sane enough to know it. The only time I feel alright is in my dreams. With you. Three spoonfuls. Then I can dream forever. One. Two Here goes. Goodbye waking world.
xml.info: The spoon moves towards her mouth. Fry's photo suddenly starts talking.
xml.speak: 'S PHOTO Leela! No! Listen to me, you don't want to lie in bed like a vegetable and do nothing the rest of your life. I've tried it. Bedsores hurt!
(CRYING) Then what am I s'posed to do?
'S PHOTO Fight it!
(CRYING) I can't!
'S PHOTO You can! The Leela I know doesn't give up this easily.
OK. I'll try. Go away!
xml.info: She throws the jar at it. The jar and the bee break and the one bee becomes a swarm. Leela picks up Fry's photo and holds it tightly.
xml.speak: 'S PHOTO I don't know if you can hear me Leela but there's something I wanna tell you. I love you.
(CRYING) I'm so scared Fry I don't know what to do.
'S PHOTO Just wake up Leela. Please. Just wake up.
(CRYING) I don't understand what you mean!
xml.info: She hugs the photo.
Cut to: Hospital Room. Leela is in a bed and Fry is sat at her side. His jacket is draped around her and she is in a coma.
xml.speak: (CRYING) Just wake up. Please. Just wake up Leela.
xml.info: Her eyelid flutters and opens. She looks around.
xml.speak: Fry. You're alive!
Leela! You're awake!
Of course I'm awake. You wouldn't stop waking me. Where am I?
In the hospital. The ambulance brought you here right after the bee stung you.
But the bee stung you. It barely touched me.
xml.info: Fry lifts up his shirt. There is a patch where his wound was.
xml.speak: Stinger went right through me and you got all the poison. My new spleen came from a guy who liked to motorcycle.
xml.info: He makes revving noises. Enter the rest of the crew.
xml.speak: Sweet three toed sloth of ice planet Hoth! She's awake!
xml.info: They all cheer.
xml.speak: You were in the best coma I've ever seen!
The doctor said you'd never wake up.
Really? How long was I out?
Two weeks. Fry never left your side for a minute.
And he talked non-stop, like a parrot of the sea he was.
I though that if you heard a familiar voice, it might help keep your mind together. But, who knows if it really got through.
It got through Fry. It got through.
xml.info: THE END
